name: AirPods Pro

name: Huawei Enjoy 20e
description: Huawei Enjoy 20e is based on HarmonyOS and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage that can be expanded via microSD card (up to 512GB) with a dedicated slot.

name: MULTIMEDIA BLUETOOTH SPEAKER
description: The M2290BT powered computer 2.zero audio system is designed to in shape small areas with out compromising on huge sound.
